name: Super Duper Spooper Towers
description:
Super Duper Spooper Towers is a 2D Platformer with a Top Down Overworld and a simple story.  You gotta beat every level in each of 3 towers. Also: never press escape inside a level, you'll softlock instantly. 

WARNING:

The beginning might be a little loud.  Please, before you start, turn down your volume a bit.

Move - WASD

Sprint - Shift

Short Boost - V

If you have any suggestions for improvements, or if you just get stuck somewhere, I would appreciate if you tell me in the comments. 

notes for the shop:

If you touch the shop, you are stuck. Press space to open the shop window or escape to escape.

The T-Shirts' prices might not show. They are:  70, 90, 100, 120.

The selected hat or shirt is what was last selected and pressed space on. If you buy something it's automatically selected and your character should wear it inside the level.
